code: import axios from"axios";export var postComment=function postComment(article_id,body){console.log(article_id,"<<<<<<<<<id");console.log(body,"<<<<<<<<< Body");return axios.post("https://nc-news2020.herokuapp.com/api/articles/".concat(article_id,"/comments"),{username:"cooljmessy",body:body}).then(function(_ref){var comment=_ref.data;return comment;});};export default postComment;
